---
name: Feature Request Template
about: "For feature requests. Please search for existing issues first."

---

Please search for existing issues (bugs or feature requests) first.

## Problem/Need To Be Solved
A concise description of the problem to be addressed by this feature request. Please be clear what parts of the problem are considered to be in-scope and out-of-scope.
 
## (Optional): Solution Suggestion
A concise description of your preferred solution. Include:
* Details of the technical implementation
* Tradeoffs made in design decisions
* Caveats and considerations for the future

If there are multiple solutions, please present each one separately. Save comparisons for the very end.

## Additional resources
Add any resource (video, image, audio, etc) that could help the comunity to understand the problem/need, the scope and/or the solution suggestion.
